flavor: "There is no escape".
name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Terror To Behold
text: Power Action - If one or more of this character's character dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round, discard a card from your hand to roll those dice into your pool.

flavor: "Doom is upon us."
name: Luce
subtitle: Callous Nightsister
text: Action - Discard a card from your hand that costs an odd number to reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).

flavor: "Pure warriors." <cite>Darth Maul</cite>
name: Nightbrother
text: After this die is rerolled by a card effect, you may discard the top 2 cards of your deck to resolve it, increasing its value by 1.

flavor: "Brother, I am an unworthy apprentice. I'm not like you. I never was."
name: Savage Opress
subtitle: Reckless Warrior
text: You must activate this character as your first action each round, if able, unless you spot Maul.

flavor: "I see the queen has given you a long leash." <cite>Count Dooku</cite>
name: Burst Of Lightning
text: Remove all shields from a character. For each shield just removed, you may remove a die.

name: Endow
text: Play any number of Blue upgrades from your hand on one of your Blue characters (paying each of their costs). Then roll each of those upgrades' dice into your pool.

flavor: "All I am surrounded by is fear. And dead men." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
name: Fear and Dead Men
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) for free against each of an opponent's characters.

name: I Am The Senate
text:
Play only if you have exactly one character in play.
For each die in your pool, you may remove a die showing the same value as that die.

name: Let The Hate Flow
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a blank ([blank]).
Turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Darth Vader's Meditation Chamber
text: Action - Exhaust this support to heal 1 damage from a Blue character and place 1 card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck. Then spot Darth Vader to draw a card.

name: Galactic Deception
text:
Your opponents cannot give shields to characters.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

flavor: "The senate has put a bounty on your horned little head." <cite>Asajj Ventress</cite>
name: Stifle
text: Before the effects of an opponent's event would be resolved, discard this support from play to cancel those effects instead.

name: Vader's Fist
text: After you play this support, you may roll this die into your pool. Power Action - Roll this die into your pool. Spot Darth Vader to turn this die to any side.

name: Bloodlust
text: After you resolve one of attached character's character dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]), you may deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Chain Sickle
text: After a character takes damage from this die, reroll any number of that character's character and upgrade dice.

name: Darth Vader's Lightsaber
text: After you resolve this die, you may spend 1 resource to roll one of attached character's character dice into your pool. Then, if this upgrade is on Darth Vader, deal 1 damage to a character.

flavor: "We don't like strangers." <cite>Nightsister</cite>
name: Energy Bow
text: After one of your card effects rerolls one or more character dice, you may reroll this die.

flavor: "Today, the Rebellion dies."
name: Iden Versio
subtitle: Inferno Squad Commander
text: While one or more of this character's character dice are in your pool, your opponents cannot take additional actions.

name: "Mauler" Mithel
subtitle: Vader's Wingman
text: After you activate this character, you may remove one of your vehicle dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to place that damage on a vehicle in play. Then discard that vehicle if it has damage on it equal to or more than its cost.

flavor: Due to the higher costs, super battle droids where often outnumbered on the battlefield by B1 battle droids 100 to 1.
name: Super Battle Droid
text: Power Action - Turn one of your droid character dice to a side showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

flavor: "It is said that no traitor escapes the eye of Yularen for long." <cite>Yogar Lyste</cite>
name: Wullf Yularen
subtitle: ISB Colonel
text: Power Action - Look at a player's hand and choose a card from it. Discard that card if there is a copy of it in that player's discard pile.

flavor: "Your lightsabers will make a fine addition to my collection." <cite>General Grievous</cite>
name: Browbeat
text:
Play only if you have more dice in your pool than an opponent has in their pool.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.

name: Commence Primary Ignition
text: Activate one of your Red supports. Then you may resolve any number of its support and mod dice in the order of your choice, without removing them from your pool.

flavor: "I sense a trap." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
name: Drop 'Em
text: Spot 2 Red characters to choose a weapon on up to 2 different characters. Return those weapons to their owner's hands.

flavor: "Don't worry about Higher Skies. Whatever is there, we'll find it." <cite>Wullf Yularen</cite>
name: Hatching A Plan
text: Turn a die to a side showing a discard ([discard]).

name: Imposing Presence
text: Remove an opponent's die if they have 3 or fewer cards in hand or remove 2 of an opponent's dice if they have no cards in hand.

name: In Tandem
text: Spot a Red character to turn any number of your vehicle dice that have the same title to the sides of your choice.

name: Questioned Loyalty
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a discard ([discard]).
Name a card. Then look at an opponent's hand and discard each copy of the named card from it.

name: Reach The Stars
text:
Ambush.
Reroll up to 2 dice. Then, if you are fighting on your battlefield, reroll up to 2 dice.

flavor: "We'll have to destroy them ship to ship." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
name: Black Two
text: While this die is showing ranged damage ([ranged]), increase its value by 1 if you spot "Mauler" Mithel.

name: TIE Fighter
text:
Ambush.
You may include up to 4 copies of this support in your deck.
After you play this support, search your deck for a copy of it, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Umbaran Hover Tank
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters, or 3 damage instead if one or more mods are on this support.

flavor: "I still remember my last orders. The day the real war began." <cite>Iden Versio</cite>
name: Vigilance
text:
Your opponents cannot turn dice.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

flavor: "VZ-626." <cite>Iden Versio</cite>
name: Inferno Squad ID10 Seeker Droid
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it. That opponent may take one additional action during their next turn this round.

flavor: Underneath his mask of sophistication resided a brutality that manifested through the Crimson Dawn.
name: Dryden Vos
subtitle: Ruthless Crime Lord
text: [special] - Shuffle your deck and look at the top card of it. You may play that card for free.

flavor: "You in?"
name: Tobias Beckett
subtitle: Thief For Hire
text: Power Action - Each player gains 1 resource. [special] - Take 1 resource from an opponent. If that opponent has no resources, gain 1 resource.

name: Val
subtitle: Headstrong Renegade
text: [special] - Take 1 resource from an opponent. If that opponent has no resources, deal 2 damage to one of their characters.

name: Act Of Cruelty
text: Deal 1 unblockable damage to each of an opponent's damaged characters. Then discard a random card from that opponent's hand for each defeated character they have.

flavor: "Calm down, Artoo! It's just…" <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
name: Cunning Ruse
text: Reroll a character die. Then deal damage to that character equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Exploit
text:
Play only if an opponent has no resources.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.

flavor: "I saw this ship first, so I get first claim on anything in it!" <cite>Azmorigan</cite>
name: First Claim
text: Spot a Yellow character to gain resources equal to the cost of a support or an upgrade in play.

name: Heated Confrontation
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then force an opponent to resolve one of their dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: In a Bind
text:
Force an opponent to choose 2
  • They remove 2 of their dice.
  • They discard 2 cards from their hand.
  • You deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to them.

name: Shakedown
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a disrupt ([disrupt]).
Remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.

name: Sidestep
text: Exhaust a support that costs 2 or less. Then you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself to exhaust another support that costs 2 or less.

name: Wanton Destruction
text: For each character die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), deal damage equal to its value to its matching character.

name: Déjà Vu
text: After you play an event, you may exhaust this support to play that event from your discard pile (paying its cost). You cannot take more than one additional action this turn.

name: Firespray-31
text: Power Action - Play a mod from your hand on this support, if able, decreasing its cost by 2.

name: Relentless
text:
Your opponents cannot heal characters.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

flavor: A weapon of choice for the Kanjiklub.
name: Donderbus Blaster Pistol
text:
Yellow character only. Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade, you may activate attached character.

flavor: The bounty hunter Latts Razzi wielded the triple scaled rows of a grappling boa.
name: Grappling Boa
text: After a character takes damage from this dice, you may remove one of that character's character dice.

name: Tobias Beckett's Rifle
text:
After you play this upgrade on Tobias Beckett, you may force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to an opponent's character, or 3 damage instead if that opponent has no resources.

name: Vow Of Vengeance
text: Increase the value of each of attached character's character dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) by 1 for each defeated character you have.

name: Retribution
text:
Include only if you have a character that is 20 or more points on your team.
After one or more of your character dice are removed by an opponent, you may deal 1 damage to a character.

flavor: "It pays for one to be prepared." <cite>Luminara Unduli</cite>
name: Barriss Offee
subtitle: Studious Padawan
text: After another character's character die is turned, you may turn one of this character's character dice to a side showing the same symbol as that die.

name: Force Mystic
text: Each Blue ability on this character has Redeploy. [special] - Roll a die on a Blue ability on this character into your pool.

flavor: "Revenge is not the Jedi way."
name: Kit Fisto
subtitle: Shii-cho Master
text: Before this character takes damage, you may remove one of his character or upgrade dice showing melee damage ([melee]) to block damage equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Qui-Gon Jinn
subtitle: Defiant Jedi Master
text:
While this character has 2 or more shields, increase the value of his character dice by 1.
While this character has 3 or more shields, increase the value of his upgrade dice by 1.

name: Bewilder
text: Spot a Blue character to reroll an opponent's character die. Then discard cards from the top of that opponent's deck equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Finishing Strike
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) as unblockable. Then, if the character just dealt damage has 1 remaining health, defeat it.

name: Gathering Intelligence
text: Look at each opponent's hand. Look at the top card of each deck.

name: Hold Off
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a shield ([shield]).
Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]) or give a character 1 shield.

name: Insight
text: Draw 2 cards. Place 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Into Exile
text:
Play only if you spot 2 ready characters.
Exhaust one of your characters. Then, until the end of the action phase, block all non-indirect damage dealt to that character by your opponents. Set this event aside.

name: Repulse
text: Choose 2 dice that are different colors. Then remove those dice.

name: Safeguard
text: Give a character shields equal to the number of upgrades on one of your characters.

name: Immutability
text:
Each of your upgrades has Redeploy.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

name: Counterstroke
text:
Blue character only.
After an opponent deals damage to attached character, you may resolve this die, increasing its value by 1.

flavor: Before younglings are taught to construct a lightsaber, the must first prove themselves against a remote with only a wooden staff.
name: Lightsaber Training Staff
Pillio Star Compass
text: Power Action - Turn one of your dice to a side matching the symbol and value showing on this die.

name: Qui-Gon Jinn's Lightsaber
text: After 1 or more shields are removed from attached character, you may exhaust this upgrade to give that character 1 shield. Then, If this upgrade is on Qui-Gon Jinn, you may draw a card.

flavor: "They'll never stop us!"
name: Biggs Darklighter
subtitle: Rebellion Ace
text: After you activate this character, you may activate one of your vehicle supports. Then reroll any number of that vehicle's support and mod dice.

name: Clone Commander Cody
subtitle: Loyal Strategist
text:
While building your team, the point value of each Clone Trooper ([LEG]38) is decreased by 1.
[special] - Take control of the battlefield and use its claim ability or power action, even if it has been used this round.

flavor: "Rebellions are built on hope."
name: Jyn Erso
subtitle: Daring Infiltrator
text: After you activate this character, you may look at the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck, and rearrange them in any order. You may discard the top card of that deck.

name: Rebel Engineer
text: After you activate this character, you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck, reveal a mod from among them, and add it to your hand. Place the rest of those cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Aerial Advantage
text: Play only if you control the battlefield. Spot a Red character to turn a die to any side. You may spot a vehicle to remove a die. You may spot a mod to turn a die to any side or remove a die.

flavor: "I have to admit that without the clones it would not have been a victory." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
name: Attack of The Clones
text: Ready any number of your non-unique characters that have the same title.

name: Dogfight
text: Exhaust an opponent's vehicle. Then you may ready a vehicle.

name: Evacuate
text: Defeat one of your non-unique characters. After the action phase ends, return that character to play.

name: Inflame
text:
Ambush.
Turn an opponent's die to a side showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Outgun
text: Spot any number of mods on your vehicles and spend that many resources to remove that many dice.

name: Turn The Tables
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a focus ([focus]).
Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Armed Escort
text:
Each of your characters has Guardian.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

name: BB-8
text: Action - Spot a vehicle support to attach this card to it as a mod upgrade (discard all upgrades on this card). If that vehicle is Black One, ready it. Use this action only once per game.

name: Black One
text: Power Action - Spot Poe Dameron to turn this die to any side. [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. If a droid is attached to this support, reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: X-Wing
text:
You can include up to 4 copies of this support in your deck.
The X on this die is equal to the number of copies of this support you have in play.

name: Jyn Erso's Blaster
text:
Redeploy.
After you activate attached character, you may reroll this die or discard the top card of a deck. If this upgrade is on Jyn Erso, reroll any number of her character dice.

name: R2 Astromech
text: Modify vehicle support. Action - Exhaust this upgrade and spend 2 resources to ready attached vehicle.

flavor: "Everything you heard about me is true."
name: Lando Calrissian
subtitle: Smooth and Sophisticated
text: Power Action - Play a Yellow vehicle from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1 and giving it Ambush. If that vehicle is the Millennium Falcon, you may activate it.

name: Leia Organa
subtitle: Boushh
text:
You can include up to 5 Yellow villain cards in your deck.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters unless they give you 1 resource, or 2 resources instead if you spot a villain card.

name: L3-37
subtitle: Droid Revolutionary
text: Before this character is defeated, spot a vehicle support to attach this card to it as a 0 cost mod upgrade. If that vehicle is the Millennium Falcon, ready it. If this card would leave play as an upgrade, set it aside instead.

name: A Good Investment
text: Play only if you have one or more dice showing a resource ([resource]). Gain 4 resources, or 5 resources instead if you took 2 or more actions this turn (not this round).

name: Aid From Above
text:
Force an opponent to choose 2:
• You draw 2 cards.
• You gain 2 resources.
• You take 2 additional actions.

name: Daring Gambit
text: Reroll all of your dice. Then resolve one of your Yellow dice, increasing its value by the number of other dice in your pool. Remove all of your dice.

flavor: "We do it right, they won't even know we're there. Not until it's too late." <cite>Lando Calrissian</cite>
name: Drop In
text: Activate one of your characters or supports. If you are fighting on your battlefield, this event has Ambush.

name: Hijack
text: Spot a Yellow character to take control of an opponent's vehicle support that has no mods and ready it (return its die to its card). After the action phase ends, return that vehicle to its owner's control.

name: Karabast!
text:
Play only if an opponent has one or more dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
Move up to 3 damage from one of your characters to another one of your characters.

name: Leverage
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Reluctance
text:
Ambush.
Choose an opponent. That opponent cannot resolve more than one die during their next turn this round.

name: Slice And Dice
text: Remove 2 of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]). Then deal unblockable damage equal to the combined value showing on those dice to any number of characters, distributed as you wish.

name: Through The Pass
text: Activate one of your characters or supports. Then you may spend resources equal to the number of dice you just rolled to ready that character or support.

name: Escape Craft
text: Power Action - Spot the Millennium Falcon to attach this card to it as a mod upgrade (discard all upgrades on this card). Action - If this card is an upgrade, it becomes a support (do not ready it).

name: Millennium Falcon
text: After you play this support, you may search your deck or discard pile for Escape Craft ([AtG]102) and attach it to this support as a mod upgrade (without paying its cost). If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

name: On The Mark
text:
You may resolve the indirect damage ([indirect]) sides of your dice as ranged damage ([ranged]).
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

name: Decoy
text:
Yellow character only.
Before a character would be dealt damage, you may exhaust this upgrade to deal that damage to attached character instead.

name: Energy Pike
text: [special] - Deal damage to a character equal to the number of resources you have, to a maximum of 3.

name: Token Of Affection
text: After you play a card that has Ambush, you may move this upgrade to another one of your characters (return this die to its card).

name: At Odds
text: Remove a die showing a value that is an odd number. You may place this event on the bottom of your deck.

name: Common Cause
text: Spot any number of Blue characters to draw that many cards.

name: Conflicted
text: Reroll one of your Blue character dice. Then, if that die just rolled damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), deal 2 damage to a character. Otherwise, give a character 2 shields.

name: Deadly Advance
text: Count the number of exhausted characters your opponents have. Turn up to that many of your dice to sides showing melee damage ([melee]).

name: No Questions Asked
text: Spot a Blue character and give an opponent up to 3 of your resources to remove that many dice. If you are fighting on your battlefield, draw that many cards.

name: Relinquish
text:
Ambush.
Return an upgrade you own in play to your hand.

name: You Were My Friend
text: Turn a character die to any side. If you have more Blue cards in play than an opponent, you may remove that die.

flavor: "Look what has become of you. A rat in the desert." <cite>Maul</cite>
name: Bitter Rivalry
text: After setup, choose an opponent. That opponent deals 2 unblockable damage to one of your characters and draws a card.

flavor: "Sense the future, once all Jedi could." <cite>Yoda</cite>
name: Foresight
text: Action - Exhaust this support to look at the top card of a deck. You may place that card on the bottom of that deck.

flavor: "It binds the galaxy together." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
name: Nexus Of Power
text: After you activate this support, you may turn this die to any side.

name: Force Lift
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character or return a support in play that costs 3 or less to its owner's hand.

name: Shatterpoint
text: Blue character only. [special] - Discard an equipment or a weapon from play that costs equal to or less than the number of Blue ability dice in your pool (including this die).

name: Treasured Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade, you may draw a card.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character, or 3 unblockable damage instead if you have 5 or more cards in your hand.

name: Attack Formation
text: Spot a Red character to resolve one of your non-character dice, increasing its value by the number of copies of that die in your pool (including that die).

name: Barrel Roll
text: Activate one of your supports. Reroll any number of its support and mod dice. Then reroll any number of its support and mod dice.

flavor: "Squadron up. Target Eadu." <cite>General Draven</cite>
name: Deployment
text: Activate any number of your supports and non-unique characters.

flavor: "Green Group, stick close to holding sector MV-7." <cite>Admiral Ackbar</cite>
name: Fleet Command
text: Spot any number of Red characters to reroll that many dice (yours and/or an opponent's).

name: Intense Fire
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if you have more Red cards in play than an opponent.

name: Revised Order
text: Turn a die to a side that has a value 1 higher than the value showing on it. If you control the battlefield, return this event to your hand.

name: Snuff Out
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove all dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Transfer
text: Move a mod on one of your vehicle to another one of your vehicle supports.

name: Armored Reinforcement
text: Action - Set this plot aside to search your deck or discard pile for a vehicle support and play it, decreasing its cost by 1. If you search your deck, shuffle it.

flavor: Lined with 1,024 repulsorpods, the cavernous Senate Chamber was the meeting hall for the Galactic Senate.
name: Senate Chamber
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice to turn a die to any side.

name: Dorsal Turret
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may roll this die into your pool.

flavor: The Alliance made sure to find a use for every weapon they could, from stun batons to repurposed TIE fighter cannons.
name: Handheld L-S1 Cannon
text: Attached character's upgrade limit is decreased by 1.

name: Triple Laser Turret
text: Modify vehicle support. While this die is in your pool, attached support's die cannot be removed by your opponents.

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Independent Hotshot
text: [special] - Deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. You may reveal a villain card from your hand to force that opponents to lose 1 resource. You may reveal a hero card from your hand to gain 1 resource.

flavor: "We're doing this my way."
name: Qi'Ra
subtitle: Street Savvy
text: You can include Yellow hero and Yellow villain events in your deck.

name: Across The Galaxy
text: Spot a vehicle to switch the battlefield with a battlefield that was brought to the game. If you do not control the battlefield, gain 1 resource.

name: Cash Out
text:
Ambush.
Resolve any number of your dice showing a resource ([resource]).

flavor: "That was my best dissecting hand!" <cite>0-0-0</cite>
name: Dismantle
text: Spot a Yellow character and choose a support in play that has no mods. Then spend resources equal to that support's cost to discard it.

name: Fight Fire With Fire
text: Remove one of your dice showing indirect damage ([indirect]) to remove a die.

name: Indifferent
text: Spot a neutral character to remove a die.

name: Quick Thinking
text: Spot any number of Yellow characters to resolve that many of your Yellow dice in the order of your choice.

name: Shock Tactic
text:
Ambush.
Remove a non-unique die and all copies of it from each of your opponent's pools.

name: Double Down
text: You can include one additional copy of up to 2 different cards in your deck (following all other deckbuilding restrictions).

name: Improvised Defense
text: After a die is turned, you may discard this support from play to remove that die.

flavor: "I got the best weapons, best ship, and I'm feared across the galaxy." <cite>Ketsu Onyo</cite>
name: Shadow Caster
text: Decrease the resource cost on each side of this die by 1 for each mod on this support.

name: Arc Caster
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may activate attached support. Then you may reroll a die.

name: Black Sun Blaster Pistol
text:
While this upgrade is on a neutral character, it has Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. Then deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Flame Projector
text: Yellow character only. Action - Resolve this die showing melee damage ([melee]) as indirect damage ([indirect]), incresing its value by 1.

name: Shriek
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing a value of 0 (blanks and specials have a value of 0).

name: T-16 Skyhopper
text: Ambush. This support can be activated. After you play this support, search your deck or discard pile for a mod and play it on this support, if able. If your searched your deck, shuffle it.

flavor: "Ever since the XP-38 came out, they just aren't in demand. - Luke Skywalker"
name: X-34 Landspeeder
text: This support can be activated. After you activate this support, you may reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).

name: Laser Cannon
text: Modify vehicle support. After you activate attached support, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

name: Systems Gauge
text: Modify vehicle support. After you activate attached support, you may spend 1 resource to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Targeting Astromech
text: Modify vehicle support. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to turn attached support's die to any side.

name: No Allegiance
text:
Include only if you have no hero or villain characters on your team.
Each of your neutral characters has +1 health.

name: Solidarity
text: Include only if each character on your team is the same color and your deck contains no more than one copy of any card.

name: Landing Dock
subtitle: Scipio
text: After any player plays a vehicle, that player may take control of this battlefield. Power Action - Reroll a die.

name: Occupied City
subtitle: Lothal
text: After an opponent plays a support or an upgrade, you may discard the top card of their deck.

name: Theed Royal Palace
subtitle: Naboo
text: Power Action - Gain 1 resource. Spot a neutral character to take one additional action.

name: Training Room
subtitle: Kamino
text: Power Action - Reroll any number of your non-unique character dice.
